abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews Andrew Morgan documentary film The True Cost.
lead_paragraph: This documentary by Andrew Morgan details the exploitation of workers in garment factories and cotton fields around the world.

headline.main: Review: ‘The True Cost’ Investigates High Price of Fashion Bargains
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘The True Cost’ Investigates High Price of Fashion Bargains

snippet: This documentary by Andrew Morgan details the exploitation of workers in garment factories and cotton fields around the world.
